card.name: Captivating Crossroads
card.text: During your first three turns of the game, Captivating Crossroads enters the battlefield tapped if you were the starting player. As Captivating Crossroads enters the battlefield, choose a color. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

card.name: Cerise, Slayer of Fear
card.text: First strike, lifelink At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, if you gained life this turn, seek a card with the highest mana value among cards in your library with mana value less than or equal to the amount of life you gained this turn.

card.name: FRAMTIDE
card.text: When Jewel Mine Overseer enters the battlefield, conjure seven cards named Seven Dwarves on top of your library. They perpetually gain "When this creature enters the battlefield, draw a card." Then shuffle. At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this

card.name: Heir to Dragonfire
card.text: {R}: Heir to Dragonfire gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {2}{R}, Reveal Heir to Dragonfire from your hand: Heir to Dragonfire perpetually becomes a Dragon, gets +3/+3, and gains flying.

card.name: High Fae Prankster
card.text: Flying, deathtouch When High Fae Prankster enters the battlefield, choose up to one — • Perpetually exchange target creature's base power with another target creature's base power. • High Fae Prankster perpetually has base power and toughness 4/1.

card.name: Outfitted Jouster
card.text: When Outfitted Jouster enters the battlefield, conjure a card named Steelclaw Lance and a card named Brawler's Plate onto the battlefield and attach them to Outfitted Jouster. If damage would be dealt to Outfitted Jouster while it's equipped, prevent that damage. When damage is prevented this way, sacrifice an Equipment attached to Outfitted Jouster.

card.name: Paths of Tuinvale
card.text: Choose one or both — • Return target creature you control to its owner's hand. That card perpetually gains "This spell costs {1} less to cast." • Return target creature you don't control to its owner's hand. That card perpetually gains "This spell costs {1} more to cast."

card.name: Talion's Throneguard
card.text: Flash Bargain Flying When Talion's Throneguard enters the battlefield, return up to one target spell or nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If Talion's Throneguard was bargained, that card perpetually gains "This spell costs more to cast."

card.name: Victory of the Pyrohammer
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Victory of the Pyrohammer deals 4 damage to each creature and each planeswalker. Victory of the Pyrohammer gains "Damage isn't removed from creatures during cleanup steps." II, III — Victory of the Pyrohammer deals 1 damage to each creature and each planeswalker.
